=======
History
=======

1.2.0 (2020-05-13)
------------------

* Fix PyPi deployment (IoT certificates were missing)


1.1.0 (2020-05-12)
------------------

* Change brightness from int (0 - 255) to float (0.0 - 1.0)
* Added logic to fetch device status on startup
* Bugfixes


1.0.0 (2020-05-08)
------------------

* Initial version
